definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Fugue world dream of a millennium?
I usually elect to play mind games with any suspected fish before beginning a new drift.
sentences.chinese: 我通常選擇於開始一次新飄流前跟可疑的魚兒鬥鬥智。

sentences.english: Many vagabonds gathered at the back of this restaurant to find food.
sentences.chinese: 很多飄流漢會萃在這家餐廳的後面找尋食品。

sentences.english: And I float everywhere at sea.
sentences.chinese: 海風吹，海浪湧，隨我飄流四方。

sentences.english: The empty boat drifted on the sea.

definition: to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
turbid flow/muddy waters/fig. a contemptible person/fig. corrupt or disgraceful social trends
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
to have cordial relations with each other/to have sexual intercourse
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
